column5: Welcome to Broken Wire Bed and Breakfast! At Broken Wire Ranch we offer privacy, seclusion and the opportunity to get away from the stress of everyday life. Relax in the tranquility of a country setting. The stay includes, Queen size bed, twin day bed and trundle, full kitchen, including microwave, stove, refrigerator, washer/dryer, tv/dvd player. Also enjoy nearby attractions such as Shangri-La Gardens, Stark Museum of Art, Sunset Grove Country Club, and more!
